title: LOKI: What's Next for KANG in Ant-Man and the Wasp: QUANTUMANIA | Marvel Teaser BREAKDOWN
author: ScreenCrush
description:
Loki season one may be finished, but Kang is just getting started. The villain is going to appear in Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania, which jus started filming. In this video we explain possibilites for Kang's role in the movie, Iron lad, and how all of this will lead into the Young Avengers. We also break down Kang's origin in the MCU, how it fits into the quantum realm, and sets him up to be the greatest Big bad of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

If you're new, Subscribe! →
